mapper.insert: insert into clazz(name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject) values(#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject})
mapper.select:
select c.*, e.name masterName, (case when begin_date>now() then '未开班' when now()>end_date then '已结课' else '已开班' end) status from clazz c left join emp e on c.master_id=e.id
and c.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and c.end_date between #{begin} and #{end}
order by c.update_time desc
